title: Best Crypto under $0.1? Price models suggest a 700% setup for Mutuum Finance (MUTM)
description: The crypto market has entered a familiar pause. Bitcoin has pulled back from recent highs, Ethereum has stalled near key levels, and meme coins that once drove fast gains are losing momentum. When these slowdowns happen, capital rarely leaves the market. Instead, it rotates. Traders begin searching for smaller DeFi crypto projects that are less […]
